name: Indiana Department of Workforce Development
description: Official state workforce development partner providing WIOA funding and career pathway programs.

name: Indianapolis Workforce Board
description: Local workforce investment board serving Marion County with job training and placement services.

name: CompTIA Technology Certification
description: Industry-leading IT certification programs for high-demand technology careers.

name: Microsoft Azure Certifications
description: Cloud computing and digital skills certification programs with guaranteed job placement assistance.

name: Google Cloud Professional Training
description: Enterprise cloud technology training with direct pathways to high-paying tech careers.

name: IBEW Local 481 Electrical Union
description: Electrical apprenticeship programs leading to union careers with excellent benefits and wages.

name: Sheet Metal Workers Local 20
description: Advanced manufacturing and HVAC apprenticeships with immediate job placement upon completion.

name: Indiana Manufacturers Association
description: Manufacturing skills training and Industry 4.0 preparation programs with employer partnerships.

name: Indiana Hospital Association
description: Healthcare workforce development including nursing, medical assistant, and healthcare IT programs.

name: Beauty Professionals of Indiana
description: Cosmetology, esthetics, and salon management certification programs with business development training.
